venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
"Red" is a spy comedy thriller starring Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich, Helen Mirren, and Mary Louise Parker. Let's get together for this movie next Sunday, October 24. We can see the movie and go out for dinner afterwards.

The movie is playing at Blackstone Valley Cinema at 4:35 PM and 7:10 PM. How about we meet in the lobby at about 4:15 for the 4:35 show? If anyone who RSVPed "Yes" would rather go to the 7:10 show, let me know. I'm willing to consider rescheduling if 4:35 is inconvenient.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Red
